title: Alpha Returns
description: Web3 multiplayer PvP shooter with tokenized assets and crypto rewards.
shortDesc: PvP shooter built with Web3, NFT economy and multiplayer combat.
features: Implemented Photon Fusion for real-time networking
Integrated NFT minting + wallet auth using Web3 SDK
Optimized rendering pipeline to boost FPS on mobile
roles: Lead Unity Developer for core game systems
Designed and implemented NFT inventory system

contributions.name: Multiplayer PvP with Photon Fusion
contributions.shortDesc: Implemented real-time multiplayer using Photon Fusion with support for FPS and TPS combat.
details: Built tick-based prediction and lag compensation systems for smooth, competitive gameplay.
Handled room lifecycle: matchmaking, reconnect, and state syncing.
Supported real-time character control, shooting, respawns, and networked hit validation.
Optimized network payloads for mobile performance.

contributions.name: Modular Weapon & Inventory System
contributions.shortDesc: Created a dynamic weapon system with support for upgrades, attachments, and multiplayer syncing.
details: Used ScriptableObjects to define weapon classes and stats.
Developed real-time attachment toggling (scopes, silencers, skins).
Inventory persisted across matches using blockchain or cloud backend.
Supported multiplayer weapon swaps, drops, and usage tracking.

contributions.name: Web3 NFT Integration
contributions.shortDesc: Integrated blockchain wallet login, NFT minting, and ownership-based asset access.
details: Connected wallet SDK for account linking and token verification.
Enabled players to view, claim, and equip NFTs in-game.
Assets linked to blockchain contracts for authenticity and scarcity.
UI adapted based on wallet status and ownership.

contributions.name: Hybrid Economy: IAP + Token
contributions.shortDesc: Enabled both Google Play in-app purchases and crypto-token rewards in a unified system.
details: Used Google Play Billing for fiat purchases of premium items.
Integrated blockchain token system for daily/earned rewards.
Balanced economy around both traditional and Web3 systems.
Synced purchase results to Firebase and on-chain records.

contributions.name: Matchmaking & Room Management
contributions.shortDesc: Implemented real-time matchmaking with ELO balancing and bot fallback.
details: Created lobby matching logic based on player skill and availability.
Handled Photon Room creation, joining, and teardown events.
Fallback logic inserts AI bots if real players are unavailable.
Ensured minimal wait time with match-ready UX flow.

contributions.name: AI Bots for PvP
contributions.shortDesc: Built intelligent AI bots using state-based behavior trees for fallback multiplayer.
details: Used FSM and Unity NavMesh for smart pathfinding and tactical behavior.
Enabled bots to patrol, chase, shoot, reload, and retreat.
Difficulty scaled dynamically based on player skill level.
Bots integrated with real player logic and synced over network.

contributions.name: Game UI & UX
contributions.shortDesc: Designed responsive UI with animated menus, lobbies, and touch-friendly controls.
details: Built using Unity UI Toolkit with custom animations and transitions.
Mobile-first layout for seamless navigation and input handling.
Lobby, loadout, reward, and result screens fully modular and theme-aware.
Integrated haptic and audio feedback to enhance interactivity.

contributions.name: NFT Reward Spin Wheel
contributions.shortDesc: Created a gamified reward wheel with NFT reward triggers tied to smart contracts.
details: Spin outcome triggers blockchain minting or token payout.
Used physics-based spin and rarity distribution logic.
Reward animation, confirmation UI, and cooldowns included.
Prevents reward abuse through hashed results and backend validation.

contributions.name: Performance Optimization (10x)
contributions.shortDesc: Boosted FPS and reduced memory usage through asset and logic optimization.
details: Used object pooling, static batching, and LOD systems.
Optimized texture usage via atlases and compression.
Reduced GC pressure and CPU spikes via system refactors.
Achieved 60+ FPS even on 3â€“4 GB RAM Android devices.

contributions.name: Environment Streaming
contributions.shortDesc: Added support for multiple levels with async loading and LOD optimization.
details: Built scene streaming using Unity Addressables.
Preloaded assets for seamless transitions between maps.
Used baked lighting and occlusion for memory-efficient environments.
Added level-specific logic for loot zones and player spawns.

contributions.name: Weapon Loadout UI
contributions.shortDesc: Designed intuitive UI for comparing, selecting, and equipping weapons.
details: Real-time preview of 3D weapon models with animation.
Weapon stats and rarity clearly visualized.
Supports drag-and-drop and NFT-bound lock icons.
Equipped loadout synced to multiplayer spawn logic.

contributions.name: FPS Combat Mechanics
contributions.shortDesc: Implemented immersive FPS shooting with recoil, crosshair, and visual feedback.
details: Used raycast- and projectile-based weapon logic.
Implemented recoil animation, headshot detection, and hit markers.
Synced effects like blood splatter, camera shake, and muzzle flash.
Balanced TTK (time to kill) values per weapon class.

title: Poker VR
description: VR poker game with realistic physics and intuitive hand-tracking.

title: Roulette Wheel VR
description: Multiplayer roulette with dynamic gestures and immersive design.

title: Fortune Funnel VR
description: Physics-based puzzle with haptic feedback and engaging flow.

title: War Ground
description: Offline PvP shooter featuring FPS & TPS mechanics and optimized performance.

title: Nut Color Sort
description: Terrain-based racing game with advanced suspension physics.

title: Car Drift Racing
description: Realistic mobile drift racing with fine-tuned physics and control.

title: Offroad Driving
description: Terrain-based racing game with advanced suspension physics.

title: World of Rabin
description: Arcade rhythm game with procedural levels and smooth touch response.

title: Zombie Fever
description: PvP robot game with AI combat and dynamic animations.

title: Hop Ball
description: Arcade rhythm game with procedural levels and smooth touch response.

title: Arrow Twist
description: Physics puzzle game with arrow shooting and curved targets.

title: Word Coach
description: Word puzzle game with procedural generation and UI effects.
